# chapter3.data_loading { #libs.chapter3.data_loading }

`chapter3.data_loading`

Provides functions to load the obtained results.

## Functions

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [load_reports](#libs.chapter3.data_loading.load_reports) | Loads the ML and DL reports generated from the ILOSO evaluation. |

### load_reports { #libs.chapter3.data_loading.load_reports }

`chapter3.data_loading.load_reports(path=os.path.join('data', 'chapter3', 'model-reports'))`

Loads the ML and DL reports generated from the ILOSO evaluation.

#### Parameters

| Name   | Type   | Description                 | Default                                             |
|--------|--------|-----------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------|
| `path` | str    | Root directory of the data. | `os.path.join('data', 'chapter3', 'model-reports')` |

#### Returns

| Type               | Description                                 |
|--------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| `pandas.DataFrame` | DataFrame containing the generated reports. |
